title: The Ghost Chair Exposed
outcome: Three days after the blackout, a maintenance team uncovers a dormant elevator leading to a secret basement room. Inside: a cracked screen endlessly flashing old BCI overlays and files marked 'Directive Unfinished.' Council analysis links this to unauthorized Directorate experiments conducted during the earliest BCI trials. A forensic sweep reveals the Directorate used this space to run proto-BCI experiments and override city controls, independent of Halden's design. Grassroots networks seize on the news, demanding removal of Directorate members and full exposure of off-record projects. Power struggles ripple through the Council as evidence hints the Directorate may have orchestrated Halden’s demise.

events.description: Maintenance team discovers hidden basement room accessed by long-dormant elevator. Cracked screen displays looping files and BCI overlays.
Council analysis links room to secret Directorate-led system overrides conducted during early BCI pilot phases. Suspicion of unauthorized experiments grows.
Grassroots networks circulate evidence of Directorate secrets, sparking citywide protests demanding full disclosure and Directorate resignations.
Council sessions devolve into power struggles. Directorate accused of orchestrating Halden’s death; calls for investigation intensify as internal sabotage becomes plausible.
